title: Before You Sleep
description: A trilogy of horror stories from the award-winning writer's first collection of short stories—Some Will Not Sleep—and an introduction to the nightmarish visions and ghastly spectres that have been disturbing the sleep of readers for years. In this book you'll find two ghost stories and a tale of ancestral demoniac horror:In the big white house on the hill angels are said to appear...When the children left the house, their toys remained...A confused and vengeful presence occupies the home of a first-time buyer...
author: Adam L.G. Nevill
